item.description: Platform Engineer - Giant Swarm (May 2020 – Present) / Remote Responsible for architecting and building distributed systems (Kubernetes, Go) Software Engineer - Zalando SE (Mar 2015 – Present) / Berlin, Germany Building Zalando’s Kubernetes Infrastructure on AWS Working on Zalando Payments AWS infrastructure becoming PCI-DSS certified Implement a DDos Solution to mitigate cloud-based traffic (AWS/GCP) Developing a Akamai Open Source Library System Engineer - Zalando SE (Jun 2014 – Mar 2015) / Berlin, Germany
